summary: Header and footer logo image paths were updated to the new v2 filename, but the diff does not show the new logo asset being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and it’s not verifiable from the provided changes that *all* references to the old logo path across the frontend were updated. The footer also includes several content/attribution changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: A new logo image exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and differs from the previous design.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only TypeScript/TSX changes; no new/updated image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated is included, so the new logo file’s existence/design change cannot be confirmed.
evidence: <no changes shown under frontend/public/assets/generated in diff summary>

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all frontend references that currently point to "/assets/generated/cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png" to use the new logo asset filename.
missing_requirements.reason: Only SiteHeader and SiteFooter were updated in the diff. The change does not provide evidence that there are no other references elsewhere (e.g., other components/pages) that still use the old path.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (lists many other frontend files not shown as modified)

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content changes unrelated to swapping the logo (added caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking and hostname-based appIdentifier, and a “Built with ❤️” line).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to replacing the logo asset and updating references; it explicitly lists non-goals about changing other site content/routes. These footer attribution/marketing changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added social icon imports (SiX, SiFacebook) that are not used in the shown footer JSX.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest and appears unrelated to logo swap; also potentially introduces lint/build issues depending on configuration.
